page.title: 09THE CHURCH IN LONGSTANTON
page.content: There are 2 {C.of E.}churches, All Saints and St.Michaels. The latter (in the next D-Block) is a "Reduntant" church, now seldom used. The All Saints Rector also looks after All Saints, Lolwoth. There are {Roman {Catholic }services at the Army Camp. Our Methodist Chapel closed many years ago:the nearest non-conformist chapel is the{Baptists'}Chapel at Over. A usual congregation at All Saints would be 30 to 35 people. There are many more at Christmas and Easter. Communion is now from the{Alternative {Service Book (Rite A),}except for one Sunday a month when the{1662}service is retained. The Rector considers that many more people are reached by the ministry than actually attend church.
